This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS insert a paragraph after text 
PASS insert a paragraph and character after text 
PASS insert a paragraph in text 
PASS insert two paragraphs after text 
PASS insert two paragraphs and a character after text 
PASS insert a paragraph before text 
PASS insert a paragraph and character before text 
PASS insert a paragraph after word 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
